## CardsReader.onDeviceDisconnected property

An event handler for the [DeviceDisconnected](./devices.devicedisconnected.md) event. This is a unicast subscription, i.e. only one handler can be registered at once.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onDeviceDisconnected: Handler<DeviceDisconnected>;
```
